data.description: This 3937 square foot single family home has 4 bedrooms and 4.0 bathrooms. This home is located at 1026 Marshside Way, Belville, NC 28451.
data.whatILove: The location! Located on the Brunswick River and comes with a private 30' boat slip and deep water access. Best of both worlds...rural setting but less than 10 minutes to Wilmington or Leland. A gorgeous water access community overlooking Eagle Island, a wildlife sanctuary. Cruise up the river and you are at the ICWW. A fisherman and boater's paradise! The house is beautifully set back from the road and is meticulously landscaped. The interior is pristine and the kitchen is a cook's dream come true! The river rock masonry around the fireplace is unique and adds beauty to the room. The walk-in attic and extra storage in the unfinished room over the garage is fabulous. Perfect for entertaining year round!
